# stopPlayback()

**Instance Method**

Stops playback of a Live Photo.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func stopPlayback()
```

## Manually Playing Live Photo Content

- **startPlayback(with:)**: Begins playback of Live Photo content in the view.
- **stopPlayback(animated:)**: Stops playback of a Live Photo in an animated manner.
